alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued December 04 at 5:02PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE COLORADO AVALANCHE INFORMATION CENTER. * WHAT...Avalanche Warning * WHERE...Park Range, Elk Head Mountains * WHEN...Very dangerous avalanche conditions through Saturday December 3. * IMPACTS...Dangerous avalanche conditions exist in the backcountry. Heavy snow and strong winds are resulting in widespread avalanche activity. Human triggered avalanches are very likely. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...Avoid travel on and under all steep slopes. Travel in avalanche terrain is not recommended. Consul www.colorado.gov/avalanche for detailed information.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet
